page.title: 05WIGAN DIALECT
page.content: The Wigan{dialect}is unique, being spoken nowhere else in the world. Sadly, it is gradually dying out and only the{older generation}are using it now. Here is a selection from 1985 :- ************************************** * {WIGAN} * {ENGLISH} * ************************************** * jackbit * food * * powfagged * flustered * * slappy * pie sandwich * * clempt * starving * * crategg * fool * * oozel * dirty kid * * bally warch * stomach ache * * caild * beat you to it * * w'hoam * home * * allus * always * * thisel * yourself * * t'neet * tonight * * put wood int'hole * close the door * **************************************
